languages.text: "Но ведь это правда! Тут старший офицер к этой штуке подошел слишклом близко — и все, тронулся. Изрисовал свою каюту надписями безумными, теперь только и делает, что бормочет бессмыслицу!"

traits.locale_text: "Но ведь это правда! Тут старший офицер к этой штуке подошел слишклом близко — и все, тронулся. Изрисовал свою каюту надписями безумными, теперь только и делает, что бормочет бессмыслицу!"

languages.text: "But it's true, it is! One of the senior officers came too close to this thing — clean lost his mind, he did. Wrote some mad inscriptions all over his cabin and now won't stop mumbling nonsense!"
languages.original_text: "Но ведь это правда! Тут старший офицер к этой штуке подошел слишклом близко — и все, тронулся. Изрисовал свою каюту надписями безумными, теперь только и делает, что бормочет бессмыслицу!"

traits.locale_text: "But it's true, it is! One of the senior officers walked too closed to this thing — lost his mind clean off, he did. Wrote mad words all over his cabin, and now all he does is mumble about some nonsense!"

"But it's true, it is! One of the senior officers walked too closed to this thing — lost his mind clean off, he did. Wrote mad words all over his cabin, and now all he does is mumble about some nonsense!"

"But it's true, it is! One of the senior officers came too close to this thing — lost his mind clean, he did. Wrote some mad inscriptions all over his cabin and now won't stop mumbling some nonsense!"

"But it's true, it is! One of the senior officers came too close to this thing — lost his mind clean, he did. Wrote some mad inscriptions all over his cabin and now won't stop mumbling some nonsense!"
"But it's true, it is! One of the senior officers came too close to this thing — clean lost his mind, he did. Wrote some mad inscriptions all over his cabin and now won't stop mumbling nonsense!"
"But it's true, it is! One of the senior officers came too close to this thing — clean lost his mind, he did. Wrote some mad inscriptions all over his cabin and now won't stop mumbling nonsense!"

languages.text: « Mais c'est vrai, je vous jure ! L'un des officiers supérieurs s'en est trop approché et il a perdu la boule d'un seul coup ! Il s'est mis à griffonner des inscriptions bizarres dans sa cabine et depuis, il n'arrête pas de marmonner des âneries. »
languages.original_text: "But it's true, it is! One of the senior officers came too close to this thing — clean lost his mind, he did. Wrote some mad inscriptions all over his cabin and now won't stop mumbling nonsense!"

traits.locale_text: « Mais c'est vrai, je vous jure ! L'un des officiers supérieurs s'en est trop approché et il a perdu la boule d'un seul coup ! Il s'est mis à griffonner des inscriptions bizarres dans sa cabine et depuis, il n'arrête pas de marmonner des âneries. »

languages.text: “但这真的是巫术，是真的！有一位高级军官离那玩意儿太近了，然后就发疯了。他在他自己的舱室里写了一堆乱七八糟的疯言疯语，现在又没完没了地叨叨咕咕！”
languages.original_text: "But it's true, it is! One of the senior officers came too close to this thing — clean lost his mind, he did. Wrote some mad inscriptions all over his cabin and now won't stop mumbling nonsense!"

traits.locale_text: “但这真的是巫术，是真的！有一位高级军官离那玩意儿太近了，然后就发疯了。他在他自己的舱室里写了一堆乱七八糟的疯岩疯语，现在又没完没了地叨叨咕咕！”

languages.text: "Aber es ist doch wahr! Einer der ranghohen Offiziere ist dem Ding zu nah gekommen und hat den Verstand verloren, einfach so. Hat seine ganze Kabine mit verrückten Sachen vollgeschmiert und hört nicht auf, wirres Zeug zu reden!"
languages.original_text: "But it's true, it is! One of the senior officers came too close to this thing — clean lost his mind, he did. Wrote some mad inscriptions all over his cabin and now won't stop mumbling nonsense!"

traits.locale_text: "Aber es ist doch wahr! Einer der ranghohen Offiziere ist dem Ding zu nah gekommen und hat den Verstand verloren, einfach so. Hat seine ganze Kabine mit verrückten Sachen vollgeschmiert und hört nicht auf, wirres Zeug zu reden!"

languages.text: «¡Pero es verdad! Uno de los oficiales de mayor graduación se acercó demasiado a esta cosa y perdió completamente la cabeza. ¡Se puso a escribir cosas extrañas en su camarote y ahora no deja de murmurar absurdeces!»
languages.original_text: "But it's true, it is! One of the senior officers came too close to this thing — clean lost his mind, he did. Wrote some mad inscriptions all over his cabin and now won't stop mumbling nonsense!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Pero es verdad! Uno de los oficiales senior se acercó demasiado a esta cosa y perdió completamente la cabeza. ¡Se puso a escribir cosas extrañas en su camarote y ahora no deja de murmurar absurdeces!»

languages.text: 「だけど、そうだろ！上級士官のひとりがこれに近づきすぎて…頭がイカれたんだぞ。自分の船室のあちこちに狂った言葉を書きまくって、今では意味の分からないことをブツブツつぶやいている！」
languages.original_text: "But it's true, it is! One of the senior officers came too close to this thing — clean lost his mind, he did. Wrote some mad inscriptions all over his cabin and now won't stop mumbling nonsense!"

traits.locale_text: 「だけど、そうだろ！上級士官のひとりがこれに近づきすぎて…頭がイカれたんだぞ。自分の船室のあちこちに狂った言葉を書きまくって、今では意味の分からないことをブツブツつぶやいている！」

languages.text: "İftira değil ki! Kıdemli subaylardan biri bu şeye biraz fazla yaklaştı, düpedüz aklını yitirdi. Kabininin duvarlarına deli işi bir şeyler yazmış, şimdi de hiç durmadan anlamsızca sayıklıyor!"
languages.original_text: "But it's true, it is! One of the senior officers came too close to this thing — clean lost his mind, he did. Wrote some mad inscriptions all over his cabin and now won't stop mumbling nonsense!"

traits.locale_text: "Doğru ama yine de! Rütbeli subaylardan biri bu şeye biraz fazla yaklaştı, düpedüz aklını yitirdi. Kabininin duvarlarına deli işi bir şeyler yazmış, şimdi de hiç durmadan anlamsızca sayıklıyor!"
